name: Sheppard
description:
The Game

Sheppard is a lovely 2D sidescroller with a focus on combat and leveling. The world you are playing in seems very calm and chill but don't be deceived! The beautiful shell houses a dark secret.

Collect coins, buy power ups and fight through different stages, for fame and glory ... or just because it's fun.

Controls

  •  to jump
  •  and  to run
  •  to attack
  •  to dash
  • to interact

A game made for Ludum Dare 48 - Deeper and deeper

2D Art & Game Design

  • Lukas Fahrngruber (Xenobey)
  • Philip Nuss (Peanut)

Scripting and Game Logic:

  • Marc Müller (Cratuss)
  • Philip Nuss (Peanut)

Music and SFX

  • Lukas Fahrngruber (Xenobey)
